description: The file is the main entry point and a collection of Flutter widget classes for a Recipe Explorer mobile application. It defines the app structure, routing, state management, UI components, and models for handling recipes, user authentication, and interface interactions.

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: Model class representing a recipe, including properties like id, title, imageUrl, duration, average rating, ingredients, category, creator, and instructions.

classes.name: RecipeProvider
classes.description: State management class that holds the list of recipes, handles filtering, favorites, and persistent storage via shared preferences.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Manages user registration, login, logout, and avatar URL generation for demo purposes.

classes.name: RecipeExplorerApp
classes.description: Main app widget setting up providers and routes.

classes.name: MainScreen
classes.description: Root widget managing bottom navigation and tab views for the app sections.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Displays the main feed with greeting, categories, featured recipes, and new recipes.

classes.name: RecipeDetailScreen
classes.description: Displays detailed view of a selected recipe with options to favorite or edit if owned.

classes.name: AddEditRecipeScreen
classes.description: Form modal for adding a new recipe or editing an existing one.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: Allows user to log in with username.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: Allows new user registration with username.

classes.name: _StatusBar
classes.description: Custom minimal status bar widget showing time and signals.

classes.name: ProfileAvatarButton
classes.description: Displays user avatar in UI.

classes.name: _SearchBar
classes.description: Search text field for filtering recipes.

classes.name: _CategoryChipsRow
classes.description: Horizontal scroll of category chips for filtering.

classes.name: _HorizDishScroll
classes.description: Horizontal list of recipe cards, featured dishes.

classes.name: _DishCard
classes.description: UI component displaying a recipe preview card.

classes.name: _NewRecipeHorizontalScroll
classes.description: Horizontal list of newly added recipes.

classes.name: _NewRecipeCard
classes.description: Card widget for a new recipe with image, rating, creator info.

classes.name: _StarRating
classes.description: Displays star-based rating for recipes.

classes.name: _Avatar
classes.description: Displays avatar image based on creator's name.

classes.name: _buildTabBar
classes.description: Builds the bottom navigation bar with icons.

classes.name: _tabButton
classes.description: Creates individual tab buttons for bottom navigation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes Flutter binding, device orientation lock, and runs the RecipeExplorerApp.
